acasa.home_subtitle: Our company is a start up founded by a team of experts with the objective of solving problems
acasa.coockie_pupUp_text: This website uses cookies to make sure you have the best experience on our website.

solutii.solutii_title: You bring the broblem, we come with the solution
solutii.solutii_subtitle: Take the initiative against any chalange
solutii.optimisation_short_description: It is possible that the systems that hold your organisation together can no longer sustaine it
solutii.automation_short_description: Repetitive tasks take the important time that your team could use to inovate
solutii.cloud_native_description: The right tehnology is just a step in your journey in cloud native.
solutii.work_in_cloud_title: I have to work in the cloud
solutii.work_in_cloud_description: In our hibryd cloud, aplications and data run fluidly between public cloud, private cloud at local and virtual level
solutii.solutions_page_title: You bring the problem, we come with the solution
solutii.solutions_page_title_above: Take the initiative against every IT problem
solutii.automation_long_description: Repetitive tasks take the important time that your team could use to innovate. Our automation technologies and give you the chance to reevaluate your position and to take control .
solutii.optimisation_long_description: It is possible that the systems that hold your organization together can no longer sustain it. Our portfolio of open infrastructure technologies will help you take advantage more efficiently of what you have while building what you will have.
solutii.cloud_native_long_description: The right technology is just a step in your journey in cloud-native. With the help of our technologies and open methodologies, you will be able to arrange your processes, platforms, and teams to prosper in the cloud.

servicii.enterprise_linux_description: A stable, prouven and sufficiently vestayle foundation, to start up new apps and the creation of a more secure hibryd cloud.
servicii.enterprise_linux_description2: A secure, scalable platform for the developing of public and private cloud
servicii.enterprise_linux_description3: The simplest way to manage Enterprise Linux, maintaining your systems, working efficiently, properly secured and at a high standard
servicii.cloud_computing_description: An app platform for containers that give the ability to developers to build , host, scale and deliver applications in cloud.
servicii.cloud_computing_description2: An independent registry from the system based on the network, that gives the administrators the ability to get the identity and other information about the user in a centralised database.
servicii.cloud_computing_description3: Make sure that your applications are beeing kept in a private by controlling acces to it. Quay is optimised for team work
servicii.consultare_description1: Our company contnues to help our clients while they adapt to a changing global enviroment. We can help your organization to take on new chalanges while we create a long term strategy.
servicii.consultare_description2: Working in a colaborating model to offer servicies, using modern resources and proven metotologies, we take the rol of an extension of your team to help you adapt to the new technologies.
servicii.consultare_description3: Our experts will help you take advantage to the fullest of the new technologies.
servicii.storage_description: Open file storage, that combines capable software with the lates hardware that can help avoid expensive storage options.
servicii.storage_description3: A storage platform for blocks and objects that is robust scalable for organizations that implement public or private cloud based the most popular option of storing comunity blocks for public cloud based on OpenStack.

despre_noi.title: About Us

header_param.1: If you want to know about us, you came to the right place!
header_param.2: Find out how we can help you!

despre_noi.despre_noi_param1: Our company is a start-up project, founded by a team of professionals, with the objective of solving problems. We are a dream come true, when we founded the company we knew that there was a gap in the Romanian on the software market that we filled.
despre_noi.despre_noi_param2: We understand that our clients have different needs. That is why our strategy is very client-focused. We take several stages in helping companies to align their objectives.
despre_noi.despre_noi_param3: The commitment to professionalism, trust, transparency, integrity, and dedication are just a few of the qualities that define us as people, team, and business
despre_noi.objective_descripiton: The secret to success is the balance between the pleasure of what you are doing and taking responsibility of doing it the best you can. Our team members respond to emails even after normal working hours to assure us that your software platform is as best as it can be. They do that from passion and we are proud of their will and dedication.

politica_de_confidentialitate.title: Privecy Policy

first_part.1: GDPR Privacy Policy One of our top priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This privacy policy document contains the types of information that is collected and recorded by your website and how we use it. If you have additional questions or need more information about our privacy policy, they are not included in the contract. General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) I am a data controller for your information. The legal basis of our company for the collection and use of personal information described in this privacy policy depends on the personal information it collects and the specific context in which it collects information. :
first_part.2: Our company must enter into a contract with you.
first_part.3: The processing of your personal information is in the legitimate interest of our company.
first_part.4: Our company must abide by the law.

second_part.1: Our company will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce our policies. If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. If you would like to be informed of what personal information we hold about you and would like it removed from our systems, please contact us. In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:
second_part.2: The right to access, update or delete the information we have about you

politica_de_confidentialitate.third_part: Log Files Our website follows a standard procedure for using log files. These files record visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and are part of the analysis of hosting services. The information collected by the log files includes Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referral/exit pages, and possibly number of clicks. They are not related to any personally identifiable information. The purpose of the information is to analyze trends, manage the site, track the movement of users on the site and gather demographic information. Privacy Policies Third-party ad servers or ad networks use technologies such as cookies, JavaScript or Web Beacons that are used in those advertisements and links that appear on our website, which are sent directly to users' browsers. They automatically receive your IP address when this happens. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and / or to personalize the advertising content you see on the websites you visit. Please note that our site does not have access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.
